name: Twisty Tombs
description:
Welcome to the Twisty Tombs!

Shape the dungeon by shifting columns and rows of tiles, guide your Hero to gold and glory while keeping them save from those pesky Goblins!

***

Each turn you can shift a row or column by clicking on the arrows along the edge of the Dungeon. Commit your action by clicking the green button on the bottom right of the screen. Your Hero will then move through the dungeon autonomously. 

***

This game was made for the GMTK jam 2020. It's a little rough around the edges and lacking in content and polish for now, but I'm very happy with the idea and had fun working on it!
